title: Did a Black Woman Named Malinda Borden Perish Because Titanic’s Lifeboats Were ‘Whites Only?’
subtitle: Gender, age, and class certainly played a factor in who secured lifeboat seats on the Titanic.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: A photograph shows a black woman named Malinda Borden who was denied a spot in a lifeboat on the Titanic because she was black.
